snippet.title: Aeterna Noctis – New Gameplay Teaser | 2D Action Metroidvania
snippet.description:
Aeterna Noctis is a challenging 2D Metroidvania drawn by hand, with fast-paced combat and skill-based platforming.


Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1517970/Aeterna_Noctis/

PlayStation
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10002786/

Xbox
https://www.xbox.com/es-es/games/store/aeterna-noctis/9pdzc7sb4cc1?rtc=1&wa=wsignin1.0

Epic Games Store
https://www.epicgames.com/store/es-ES/p/aeterna-noctis
